messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-Discussion] KAYCEE JUST CALLED....AND....
messages.msgSnippet: Tracy, By now she is landed safely and you can stop worrying... although that is a stupid thing to say, because your reaction is totally normal :) [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
Tracy,

By now she is landed safely and you can stop worrying... although that is a
stupid thing to say, because your reaction is totally normal :)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] KAYCEE JUST CALLED....AND....
messages.msgSnippet: Tracey, While I know that words will not ease your fears..... Your daughter is fine. She is safe. She is smart. She can think for herself. She has gone over
messages.messageBody:
Tracey,
While I know that words will not ease your fears.....
Your daughter is fine.
She is safe.

She is smart.
She can think for herself.
She has gone over this trip one hundred times.
She has spent a lifetime preparing for it.
She is fine.
She will be the daughter you raised her to be.
Honest, she's fine.

Look to the moon. You and she share that. Look to the moon...see her? See the babe? See the toddler? Remember those first steps? She was fine. She was safe.

See the child? See her grow?
Look to the moon...you and she share that.
This flight are her new baby steps.

She is fine. She is safe.
She is the daughter you raised.

Look to the moon...send your spirit to hers. You will find - she is safe.

Janis
----- Original Message -----
From: LuvsToHomeschool@...
To: docfont@... ; ASMom212@... ; cnewton@... ; Cincinnati_Home_Schoolers@yahoogroups.com ; Bovard0761@... ; hammj@... ; oh-homeschool@yahoogroups.com ; oh-od@yahoogroups.com ; gayhomeschoolers@yahoogroups.com ; OHPDE@yahoogroups.com ; HomeschoolingHighschoolersInGreaterCin@yahoogroups.com ; athomelearning@yahoogroups.com ; lesbigayhmschool@... ; Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com ; jsmith@... ; arwen1964@... ; jmarkey@... ; FayeAvon@... ; misrichmond@... ; TDeyhle@... ; Hestiahomeschool@... ; Rainbowmothers7@... ; spiritfeather@... ; RnSCarlson@... ; Tinac@...
Sent: Saturday, August 02, 2003 8:23 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-Discussion] KAYCEE JUST CALLED....AND....


Kaycee just called, I can start to breath; well, at least for a minute. She
just completed the first leg of her plane trip and is in Salt Lake City, UT.
She now has about another hour left on a 2nd plane from Salt Lake City, UT to
Billings, Montana.

PLEASE KEEP UP THE PRAYERS FOR A SAFE FLIGHT, And, for the mom who is totally
freaking out!

Tracy

We forfeit three-fouths of ourselves in order to be like other people.

~Arthur Schopenhauer~
